Typedef Documentation

typedef void(* rank_listener)(void *arg, enum card_rank r)

Listens to the final rank of my hand at the end of each game.

Parameters:
[in] arg your marshalled argument into the listener.
[in] r the rank of my hand.

Function Documentation

int simulate_razz_game ( const struct decided_cards *  decided_cards,
unsigned long  game_count,
void *  arg,
rank_listener  listener 
)

Runs a Razz game for a number of times.

Parameters:
[in] decided_cards the cards that will not be included in the simulated dealing.
[in] game_count the number of Razz games to be simulated.
[in] arg your marshalled argument into the listener.
[in] listener the callback function that will be invoked with the rank of my hand at the end of each game.
Returns:
0 if the simulation encounters no error or non-zero if it encounters one.
